SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.kohsuke.args4j
Annotation Type Argument

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Argument

Argument of the command line. This works mostly like Option except the following differences.

  1. Argument by definition doesn't have an option name.
  2. Arguments are always allowed to occur multiple times. (IOW, it works like Option#repeatable()==true.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi
